title: Keeping A Loyal Dog Is Not As Good As A Loyal Dragon - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Androgynous Characters   Calm Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Dragons   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Pets   Showbiz
author: 一扇轻收
description:
There were three big figures in the entertainment industry who couldn't be offended. The third and second wasn’t important, but it was necessary to remember Li Zhiqing, the great Buddha.

Pan Liangtiao was born well, and his background was too hard to move.

Fans from all parts of life formed a regular army with high quality in minutes.

Most importantly, people all over the country knew that there was a loyal dog around Emperor Li.

Li Zhiqing: Comparing the old dragon to a loyal dog, won't your conscience hurt?

Besides, raising a loyal dog wasn’t better than raising a loyal dragon.>
